footer.message: Come and have a good time with us !

home.about-message: M&W is a young company created in 2020 by two passionate cooks, Messan and Wilfrid. They will make you discover their culinary specialities through a menu of rich and varied dishes, prepared mainly with fresh products.
home.customer-notice-title: What our customers think of us

menu.page-description: Discover our menu and compose your meal.

contact.contact-us-text: Would you like to contact us? You can write to us by filling in the form below.

Login.withEmail: Log in to your account using your email to access your profile !

error.invalidPasswordOrEmail: The email address or password is incorrect ! Try again !

register.validate: We have sent you a confirmation email to the address indicated in the registration form. Please click on the link contained in this email to validate your registration. Thank you, we look forward to seeing you again !
